alert.note: Alert for Coastal Miami Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 2:16PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Miami-Dade County through 245 PM EDT... At 216 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Country Walk, or near The Redland, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Homestead, Homestead General Airport, The Redland, Kendall, Naranja, Princeton, Richmond West, Richmond Heights, Country Walk, Leisure City, Zoo Miami, Goulds, West Perrine, Homestead Base, Cutler Bay, Inlikita, South Miami Heights, Howard, Palmetto Estates and Three Lakes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Miami Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
